Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can identify and illustrate two different types of habitats (one land and one water).
The student can illustrate a variety of living things found in each habitat, such as different plants and animals.
The student can visually compare the diversity of plants and animals between the two habitats.
The student can demonstrate patterns of plant and animal diversity across the two habitats by organizing their drawings to highlight differences and similarities.
The student can clearly label their drawings to help explain the observed patterns and diversity of life in each habitat.
